info.name: Larecta CMS API Documentation
info.description: Larecta CMS is a modern API system developed for content management. It includes core CMS functionalities such as user management, authorization, content creation and editing. The API provides a secure and efficient way to manage your content.

item.name: Logs out the user and deletes all tokens.

Listing Operations
Display a listing of the resource.

Create Operations
Store a newly created resource in storage.

View Operations
Display the specified resource.

Update Operations

Delete Operations
Remove the specified resource from storage.

item.name:
View Operations  
Display the specified role with its permissions.

Update Operations
Update the specified role and its permissions.

Delete Operations
Remove the specified role and detach all its permissions.

Type Controller
This controller handles the CRUD operations for the Type model.

Listing Operations
Get all meta fields for a type.

Form Operations
Store a new meta field for a type.

View Operations
Display the specified meta field.

Update Operations
Update the specified meta field.

Delete Operations
Remove the specified meta field.
